name: SPECIMEN_PROC_TYPE
description: Stores the type of procedure being performed on the patient for a surgical specimen.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the specimen record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SPECIMEN_PROC_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the type of procedure being performed on the patient for a surgical specimen.
